Spokane_Valley.KBBD: KBBD (103.9 FM, "103.9 BOB-FM") is the Spokane, Washington, adult hits music formatted radio station whose slogan is "We Play Whatever". The Mapleton Communications, LLC, station broadcasts at 103.9 MHz with an effective radiated power of 39,000 watts. BOB-FM is known in Spokane as playing the biggest variety of music with the largest playlist.
